opendial.inference.approximate

Class LikelihoodWeighting

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.inference.approximate.LikelihoodWeighting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InferenceAlgorithm

    public class LikelihoodWeighting
extends java.lang.Object
implements InferenceAlgorithm
    Inference algorithm for Bayesian networks based on normalised importance sampling (likelihood weighting). The algorithm relies on the selection of samples from the network, which are weighted according to the specified evidence.
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-01-30 22:55:33 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

      • reduce

        public BNetwork reduce(ReductionQuery query)
                throws DialException
        Reduces the Bayesian network to a subset of its variables and returns the result.

        NB: the equivalent "reduce" method includes additional speed-up methods to simplify the reduction process.

        Specified by:
        reduce in interface InferenceAlgorithm
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the reduced Bayesian network
        Throws:

      • redrawSamples

        public static java.util.Stack<WeightedSample> redrawSamples(java.util.Stack<WeightedSample> samples)
                                                     throws DialException
        Redraw the samples according to their weight. The number of redrawn samples is the same as the one given as argument.
        Parameters:
        samples - the initial samples (with their weight)
        Returns:
        the redrawn samples given their weight
        Throws:
        DialException
